title: Integrating advanced fitting models with experimental catalysis to maximize H2 production in dry reforming using nickel on metalized-silica-alumina catalysts
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4927-4944
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00867G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ahmed S. Al-Fatesh, Ahmed I. Osman, Ahmed A. Ibrahim, Yousef M. Alanazi, Anis H. Fakeeha, Ahmed E. Abasaeed, Fahad Saleh Almubaddel
This study explores the enhancement of hydrogen production via dry reforming of methane (DRM) using nickel catalysts supported on metalized silica-alumina.
